meaningMnemonic: If someone makes a <radical>bamboo</radical> <radical>horse</radical>, you know it's <kanji>deliberate</kanji>. You can't accidentally make an entire horse out of bamboo.
readingMnemonic: As you admire all the <kanji>deliberate</kanji> details in this bamboo horse, the ghost of <reading>Toku</reading>gawa (とく) Ieyasu appears before you! "I deliberately made this horse to show you how important being deliberate is. You should be absolutely certain and decisive about your decisions."
